name: Golisopod
description: It will do anything to win, taking advantage of every opening and finishing opponents off with the small claws on its front legs.

attacks.name: Hard Times Slash
attacks.effect: This attack does 50 more damage for each of your opponent’s Pokémon V and Pokémon-GX in play.

attacks.name: Smash Turn
attacks.effect: Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.
